attributes.action: Stop the export of British football abroad away from it's fans and home. (RE: Premier League sell out)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to stop the export of British football abroad away from it's geographical home and fan base.
The reasons:
Fans are being replaced by profit.
Football teams represent a geographical area, not a business.
Increased player wages and club profits have not, and never will be, filtered down to the fans.
Fans from the area where the team is want to watch their team play.
Football teams are (were) hearts of the community, they are being ripped out for profit.
Fans should not be treated as nothing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
